definition: To experience an uncomfortable sensation on the skin that provokes the desire to scratch, typically caused by an irritation or an allergic reaction. This word is commonly used to describe the physical sensation of itching.

examples.german: Seine Haut juckt nach dem Kontakt mit der Pflanze.
examples.english: His skin itches after contact with the plant.

examples.german: Das juckende Gefühl lässt mich nicht schlafen.
examples.english: The itching sensation keeps me from sleeping.

examples.german: Wenn ich nervös bin, fangen meine Hände an zu jucken.
examples.english: When I'm nervous, my hands start to itch.
